title: What was the worst popular rock song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without question, the absolute worst.  1985 Grammy Award for Best Rock Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocal Lyrics We built this city, we built this city on rock an' I'd vote “I Love Rock and Roll.” Doesn't matter who sings it, it always sounds simpering, weak, limp-ljmbed and anemic. Nothing at all screams great rock rebellion or thay giant middle finger in the proverbial face, and if I could take the chorus out to a field and shoot it, I'd do it in a heart beat.
